channel.title: Mod Request/Modification request - Merger/Splitter
channel.description: There is currently a merger / splitter mod that has 3 models, was wondering if it was possible to recreate that mod but have it just 1 merger splitter but adjustable sizes, so that you can scale it to your factory easier. Much appreciated.

item.title: Mod Request/Modification request - Merger/Splitter
item.dc:creator: @RipDaPip Rip Da Pip
item.description:
@RipDaPip wrote:

There is currently a merger / splitter mod that has 3 models, was wondering if it was possible to recreate that mod but have it just 1 merger splitter but adjustable sizes, so that you can scale it to your factory easier. Much appreciated.
